segments.text: How can she just stand there drying that stupid plate while the sink floods?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing out, soaking the floor and cabinets— what a mess!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle and doesn't even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now those kids are raiding the cookie jar behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that flimsy stool, about to cause more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies like he owns the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him, reaching up like it's all a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible— the whole kitchen could be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's dripping everywhere, and no one's doing a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, but in here it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's so unaware of her own kids' mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this nonsense right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes might get knocked over in the fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes me so mad— accidents are going to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
